title: A Truly American Time Capsule
review: This movie has it all, a well interpreted and interesting setting, big hitters that do not disappoint, humor that fits all crowds, and an emotion Journey following a man and his obsession with pushing the limits.This is excellent film making, phenomenal set design, and I even found myself appreciating some of the lighting. The final frame of the film has a crazy artifact shadowing the confused bystander which transitions to the outro text.
